description: This library is a .NET wrapper for working with the JavaScript engines of Internet Explorer and Edge (JsRT versions of Chakra, ActiveScript version of Chakra and Classic JavaScript Engine). Project was based on the code of SassAndCoffee.JavaScript (http://github.com/paulcbetts/SassAndCoffee) and Chakra Sample Hosts (http://github.com/panopticoncentral/chakra-host).
summary: This library is a .NET wrapper for working with the JavaScript engines of Internet Explorer and Edge (JsRT versions of Chakra, ActiveScript version of Chakra and Classic JavaScript Engine).
title: MSIE JavaScript Engine for .NET
